name: TemplateMonster
tag_list: template, website-template, web-design, design, flash, joomla, psd, flash-cms, magento, ecommerce
overview:
TemplateMonster is a project delivering a vast variety of design products for web purposes as well as corporate design items.

The product base includes over 20,000 design items while the product range consists of 23 product types based on different software platforms (inlcluding Website templates, Flash templates and intros, Flash CMS templates, CMS and Blog Templates, eCommerce Templates, Turnkey websites and Silverlight templates). In addition to that there are over 100 topic categories available.

Over the last 8 years TemplateMonster team has delivered website template to over 1 million customers and has put up over 50,000 complete websites.

Today TemplateMonster is proud to be the only company on the design market to provide the licensed images within their designs and to provide the $400 value bonuses to their customers with each order.

external_links.title: Interview with David Braun, TemplateMonster CEO, by Ecommerce-Guide.com
